name: RMS Don't Sink
description:
A Titanic -inspired game: Made for Historically Accurate Game Jam 5.

The RMS Titanic was a passenger liner, whose maiden voyage was in April 1912, from Southampton, UK, to New York City.  A few days into the voyage, it struck an iceberg, and is widely known as one of the deadliest sinkings in history.

Ship asset - Actual top down of titanic - www.ssmaritime,com

Background assets- Tuomo Untinen.

Iceberg  assets - Kenney Vleugels.

Left/right arrow keys to move.
